channel.title: Comments on: You Don’t Have to Put on that Red Light

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Post #102, per Caydiem, they're looking into the situation.
Damn. That could have been a great crusade.
item.content:encoded:
Post #102, per Caydiem, they’re looking into the situation.

Damn. That could have been a great crusade.

item.title: By: Anon
item.dc:creator: Anon
item.description: Breaking news: <a href="http://forums.worldofwarcraft.com/thread.aspx?FN=wow-general&T=3596440&P=1" rel="nofollow">WoW doesn't want cripples!</a> Next story: Sensationalist headlines appearing on game blogs everywhere! What will become of our exclamation points?!
item.content:encoded:
Breaking news: WoW doesn’t want cripples!
Next story: Sensationalist headlines appearing on game blogs everywhere! What will become of our exclamation points?!

item.title: By: Krones
item.dc:creator: Krones
item.description: Well materialize damn you, I'll pay you in WoW gold and the Mourning CD drink coaster and this is the collectors edition bro, 10 gold sounds about fair.
item.content:encoded: Well materialize damn you, I’ll pay you in WoW gold and the Mourning CD drink coaster and this is the collectors edition bro, 10 gold sounds about fair.
